attributes.action: Began a petition for Sovereignty Rights, Bylaws, and Procedures of the USA
attributes.additional_details: I have asked over 50 lawyers and many gov't officials of both the state and the fed gov't about Sovereign-ship and usually they redirect me to other resources on the internet or even to other officials. I am Native American, a Private Citizen of the USA, which means I am of the British Parliament also. On the internet I am finding that the information about Sovereign-ship is only applicable to the Kingdom Majesties, but there is also info on differ Natives claiming Sovereignty for Independence.
attributes.background: According to my research, sovereignty has been a questionable thing of the law where many people (mostly Native Americans) have expressed their independence through sovereign-ship but have not understood the responsibility of it. Most lawyers and gov't official resist it due to lack of knowledge.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Please be aware you need to be a British citizen or UK resident to start or sign a petition.
